### Changed
- Enable teleport by default.
- Upgrade Flatcar image to [3510.2.5](https://www.flatcar.org/releases#release-3510.2.5)
- Upgrade K8S version to `1.24.17`
- Fix left-over azurefile-csi-driver helmreleases during cleanup.
